body: This shit gave me the feels, man. Didn’t come here expecting to cry to a doujin but here we are now
Ohh man, i supposed to do that thing not to crying
I'm supposed to be horny, not question what love would do to a person.
Anyone fapped and cried at the same time?
How could you got hard and at the same time filled with sadness while reading this....
The brother lived at the end, huh? Nice ending. Cute and Uplifting.

When the brother died for the first time it causes kusuha to live and create the drugs just to time leap. It is said that the brother always die between 7/3 - 7/5 which she tried to prevent by fuckin her brother at 7/3 - 7/5 when she time leap . When she was fucking her brother sometime in 7/3 the brother got the time leap power which is what is in the part 1,,, also the brother said that if she rapes kusuha time will leap ,, as he do the time leap he crossed time with kusuha which in the end he died because he didn't do the time leap ,, the reason is because he needs to rape kusuha to time leap ,, but the one he's fucking is the kusuha who loves him which doesn't count as rape ..The part two was just kusuha tryin to make her brother live so let's skip that part ,, In the part three it takes a huge turn because kusuha memories was shown to the brother, which the brother feel bad because kusuha's been time leaping for his sake, which they try to end it and she goes back time.My opinion
I really don’t understand…what even is the ending. Was she dreaming the whole time? Was she taking the drugs because she went crazy from all the time travel. Wtf
Bruh this gud
I'm not crying. You are.
We're gonna end with an open-ending? Such an evil author. @EricGN maybe she died ODing and it's her brother coming to collect her.
*guy below me* It probably was him. I don't think the creator was thinking about Time Paradoxes XD

Lets be real. It was not him because if it was then she wouldn't shown those pills at the end in the first place. 

It would be a Time Paradox.

*last page*    
   
:D
I came here to fap not to cry

Could be like "The Butterfly Effect" movie
The MC "went back to the past" and change the present
Like the time he went back to stab his hand, and in the present, his roommate saw his hands suddenly has holes
Im too depressed from this shitty world right now so my canon is that it was a real time leap drug and she prevented her brother's death and they fucked happily ever after in the end.
Bruh. Too sad to get hard. Wasn’t expecting an end like that.
About the recollection thing yes it is the alternate name of the drug and Idk about the rest it's probably just my own dum thinking :P
someone called her name and she turned her face , maybe it's her brother

So to be not confused, the drugs she made is all about experiencing the past again while being inactive in her rl world but active in her brain world its like a recollection but she can alter the memories and move around thus, making herself in pleasure on doing segs with bro
(Artificially).

I wouldn't say the looping was a lie in the end she stopped looping n probably committed suicide as a way of possibly being with him in a more "natural" sense sense the loops became bitter sweet however I COULD be wrong
